website_summaries.verdict: Larger 3-in-1 shampoo for a longer-lasting supply.

customer_reviews.title: No American Crew Smell! Is this generic?
customer_reviews.text: American Crew has a very distinct smell that’s wonderful, these don’t smell like anything, I feel like it was replaced with something generic, because it definitely is not Crew! My husband and son have been using it for years, this is the first time buying it online and there is no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works for long girl hair too!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a girl with nice long hair and always used to use fancy shampoo and conditioner... until one day I tried this at a guy friend's house because I'd forgotten my shampoo and conditioner and I expected my hair to come out a tangled mess... but it actually felt softer and smoother than when I use my own fancy products! I made the switch because it's easier, saves time, and makes my hair feel wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria J. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it! Coming from a machinist!
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hour days when I get home I don’t have time to fiddle fart. I’m dirty and greasy.It lathers good makes my hair soft and clean from my sweaty head from wearing a hat all day and my skin is soft. I feel refreshed after using finally a man body wash that works thought I was gonna have start using my wife’s body wash. DO NOT WORRY ABOUT THE PRICE! A little goes along way!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Sellers

customer_reviews.title: This is now my favorite shampoo/body wash
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying out different shampoos and body wash. Some were good but too expensive, almost all of them would dry out my skin. I came across American Crew as it has good reviews from other websites. This particular one (from Amazon) is most likely not authentic as it is way cheaper than American Crew from their website. I still decided to give it a try after reading the mostly positive Amazon reviews. I am not disappointed. It smells good and my skin isn't dry. This 3 in 1 shampoo/conditioner/body wash is my favorite now. Whether it is fake or not, it still has quality and I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: DatVatoLoco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed ! Have bought three different bath products of Am Crew and each one has a different , distinctive smell. The shampoo is different from the body wash, and both those are different from the 3 IN 1. I am tossing the 3 in 1.
customer_reviews.author: SCEMB

customer_reviews.title: Classic scent, study bottle, simplifying life
customer_reviews.text: I mean come on, does life get any easier than this?!!! 3 products in one with a nice scent. I bought a small size for my picky husband who tried it and said the buy the gallon size. So, I did then more recently bought the pump for it, here on Amazon:
customer_reviews.author: S. Spounias

customer_reviews.title: What is this?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not 100% sure because I do not have a way to support my following claim with empirical, data-driven evidence like GC-MS or HPLC but this definitely isn’t what it says it is. I know that counterfeit cosmetics and shampoos specifically have been going around on Amazon and I’ve been duped a couple times for this exact product but this felt nothing like, smelled nothing like and lathered nothing like the genuine American Crew 3-in-1. It was thin, watery, and mixed with an inferior product that was obvious to make up the majority of the fluid. It had only a faint smell of actual American Crew shampoo/body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding price for the amount!
customer_reviews.text: When ordering this bottle of Crew, I failed to pay attention to the size in the description. Thinking it was a regular size I would find at a salon, I ordered it without a second thought. To my pure delight, this bottle is huge! I used to purchase Crew shampoo and conditioner separately at a salon. Each bottle was 15.2 oz. and sold for over $17 each. I priced the same product today at CVS only it was an 8.5 oz bottle of Crew for $13.49. This is definitely a superior deal at this price for the size! The scent is fantastic, too!
customer_reviews.author: BarB

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used American Crew for my scalp for a long time. Saw they had a 3 in 1. As a man I don't like having a gazillion toiletries. Always on the move. This performs well on my hair, scalp, and skin. It doesn't leave an odor after showering so you can still drench yourself in cologne without it trying to compete with the fragrance. It does leave me skin slightly dry. I just use lotion on the elbows sometimes so they don't get ashy. It leave me with a very clean feeling. Don't feel like I have a film of slime as other body washes do.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Not American Crew inside the bottle
customer_reviews.text: The shipped item is in the right bottle but the product inside is not American Crew 3-in-1. I believe the seller replaced the product with a different, inexpensive alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever is in this shampoo is NOT American Crew. It does not smell like American Crew, nor does the liquid look like American Crew. The seller who is selling this product clearly filled it with something else. It's more like a lotion than a shampoo. American Crew now sells their products directly from their website. I'd suggest buying direct to ensure you're getting the real product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Pert Plus
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT American Crew. I was replacing an existing bottle of the same product that I purchased (at a higher cost) from a retailer, and a simple smell test made it clear. I wouldn't even have been mad that it was a knock off if it was anywhere remotely close to the original product. Will be returning, avoid this one!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Obvious Knockoff.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a knock off. I bought this for a Christmas gift exchange and when the recipient opened it to smell it, they were turned off. The smell is distinctly different than the product if you purchase it at a physical store and it is very drying on your skin. This smells like a rubber factory cleaning product, NOT the salon level, moisturizing, skin care product that you would buy at Ulta. Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: judyS

customer_reviews.title: You’re still gonna buy it.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I’m not sure who’s fault it is. My mailman may just hate me, but every time I reorder, a quarter of the contents are in the package not in the bottle. I assume this is a common problem because they bag the bottle pretty well so it’s not leaking all over the box. This is far and away a better value than buying the smaller bottle at a retail location. I just wish they would put a seal under the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake, Scam something odd like a soap lotion, No Tea tree scent whatsoever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok product came in and spilled over the cap in plastic film. So I thought no biggie it's still fine, until I smelled the bottle and compared it to my American Crew 3in1 that I had a little left over from a local store purchase months ago. Wow!!!! was I shocked not sure what was in the bottle but I hope someone does a chemical test on what this stuff was, because it sure wasn't the one I have used before. Anyway tossed this goop in the trash, who knows what it was???
customer_reviews.author: R. Hi

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson for one of his Christmas gifts. He’s just got his first apartment and was very happy with this product. It’s fast and easy to use since it works on the total body and he loves the scent. That size bottle should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: MoeRoe from MA

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. THIS IS A SCAM.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. I took a chance even after reading all the reviews; I wish I hadnt. I received a JCrew bottle with a broken seal that was filled with some other liquid. I'm assuming it's junk shampoo. This is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Evett

customer_reviews.title: Mmm wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It smells SOO GOOD!! You can use it every time you shampoo your head, which I don't because I don't want to get used to the smell, but it makes your hair feel so good after you use it. Soft, removes the grease and leaves my hair feeling so light and fluffy. My daughter loves it, fiancé loves it and that's fine because it lasts awhile (huge bottle) and we have it on subscription :) only thing, kindve heavy when it's brand new and if you don't rinse the excess soap off the bottle you could drop it and it could land on your toe.
customer_reviews.author: MisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not cool
customer_reviews.text: This is Not American Crew shampoo, the American Crew I have used in past has a minty type of smell and fresh feel on the scalp after used and this isn't it, at ALL, scam
customer_reviews.author: Dmoney

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product..doesn't smell a thing like original...my hair was like straw after a week..tried to clean my driveway with it too...no avail
customer_reviews.author: albee71

customer_reviews.title: Doest NOT have the American Crew scent
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed that this 3-1 Shampoo/body wash doesn't have the same classic "American Crew" scent. It's a huge reason why I wanted to try it. Now I have a big-ass bottle of soap to go through. Maybe I'll return it, but it's such a hassle. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: It’s Shampoo! Not gel......Mention it
customer_reviews.text: Crew does a subtle scent as a hair gel, however, don’t know about shampoo. The title had no mention that what I was ordering was shampoo. Same size container as gel, same color bottle, but a shampoo. Can be construed as misleading, should mention in title that it’s shampoo. Ended up returning it, so much for trying to order something on the fly. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: The Jig Is Up

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND WAS USING THE 3-1 SUAVE SHAMPOO UNTIL I LOOKED UP REVIEWS FOR THIS. HE HAC A LITTLE THINING UP TOP AND OTHER REVIEWS RECOMMENDED THIS. HE STARTED USING IT AND FELL IN LOVE. HIS HAIR ISNT SO GREASY, HE LOVES THE SMELL, AND HIS HAIR HAS THICKENED.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsae Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for awhile - great product 3in 1 save a lot of time in the morning.. be sure to get a pump for top and save it for your next one...
customer_reviews.author: FPG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Not the real stuff. Listen to the negative reviews. It doesn't have that original scent and it's way to cheap for the size bottle it comes in for American Crew Brand. It has all the looks and labeling of American Crew but the actual product is low quality
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Opinion
customer_reviews.text: Our opinion is that it does not have a good scent at all. As I said it’s a matter of opinion. It’s almost like a perfume like smell that gives a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought crew products many times, especially they're 3-1 at pharmacies near me- this isn't that The scent is different, suds up more than anything else, and absolutely dried out my hair
customer_reviews.author: Gianluca Arenella

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but the method of packaging was a disappointment. Specifically, each bottle cap was taped closed with what appeared to be 2" wide clear packing tape. When the tape was removed from the bottle, it left adhesive on the bottle surface making it quite sticky. It required several treatments of adhesive dissolving cleaner to get the bottle surface clean. Suggest changing to a tape that does not leave the adhesive residue when removed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Item took a very long time to receive and once I finally got it, it was damaged. The cap was broken and the liquid leaks everywhere. Very disappointed and hopefully they package this better in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent! I REALLY like this product! It has a nice masculine smell that my girl likes, but I've been liking it before her, so I'll keep buying it, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Montgomery A. Slue

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for a great product
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves my hair feeling clean and smooth. It also allows for easy use of gel since I'm not fighting all the chemicals that are found in most shampoos. Also compared to in store i got twice the amount for the same price on here.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 7.5º

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe that this is American Crew. Smells nothing like it. Feels like cheap shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Digler

customer_reviews.title: A leaky mess
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bottles of this soap. I have ordered in the past with no problems. This order was a mess l, one of the bottles was leaking all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous
customer_reviews.text: Please read the ingredients before you buy. Smell was too strong and it caused me to breakout in a rash. Not too good on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Poonam

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands wash and shampoo. It’s not an over powering scent but smells clean and sexy at the same time
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: favorite shampoo
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times I try a new shampoo I always come back to this one. Been my favorite brand for well over 10 years and is well priced on here.
customer_reviews.author: Miraclemike3

customer_reviews.title: The scent is great!
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle came crashed and made all other products in the package mosit but smelling good. I'm very happy with the scent and 3 in 1.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is FAKE!!!! The smell is not even close!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wiegel

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend love this product and I love the fact it’s 3 in 1, more room for my products in the shower lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great I’ve tried others this is the best and the price is great. Leaves your hair soft and smellS great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Best price I've seen is on x Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I don't smell anything, which is good. Gets me clean without over-drying my hair or my skin. It does help my fine hair to feel less thin.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Hall

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite
customer_reviews.text: My 21 year old & 18 year old don’t agree on much, I think they do it on purpose. Yet this is something they both love.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ford

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells good, is convenient because of the three-in-one factor
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells good, is convenient because of the three-in-one factor, and is very good at keeping you clean. I have a couple minor issues. It dries out certain strands of hair, and does not function as the best shampoo I have ever had. Secondly, it is a soap that requires a loofa to work properly, because it doesn't spread well with just using one's hands. Overall, a pretty good product. 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: arrived in plastic bag, with cap slightly loose. a bit had spilled during shipment. othwerwise great
customer_reviews.author: B. Koehn

customer_reviews.title: Not sure?
customer_reviews.text: Received this and have uses it a couple days. This isnt the smell I remember. Its fine once its been on for a while but when its fresh on the sponge it smell stale and heavy of chemicals like old cologne. They should make all these companies use packaged on dates or something. his is becoming a joke ordering off of amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Foisy

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but i wish they take care of packaging more carefully
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bottle twice. First time it was well packaged. Dint have any issues. Second time the bottle leaked out & remaining items in the package too got ruined. I hope they take care of the packaging more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Nivedita V Chekuri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love American crew for my boyfriend, the 3-1 works perfectly for him and leaves his hair soft
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Coomber

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: Not the exception, arrived exactly as other reviewers said... leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the soothing bath or shower with Crew
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Scent is awesome and the value couldn’t be better. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Smells great & good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is huge! Smells great and not drying on the skin. Very happy with this J Crew body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice all in one
customer_reviews.text: nice product, scent doesn't linger on you after your shower though.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: has a chemical smell to it
customer_reviews.text: not sure if this is the intended smell, but nothing like the shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: A great go to product!
customer_reviews.text: The best find for a combo body wash and shampoo. Scent is not overpowering for those in which that is important. I would take a bit more of scent, frankly.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shampoo and the price very good, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Inna Stadnikov

customer_reviews.title: Clean scent
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and the price is awesome! Very nice clean smell to it. Buy a pump for the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Especially for size and price. Recommend highly for scent, and moisturizing of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Rothstein

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great scent.
customer_reviews.text: I have always used American Crew. 3 in 1. It has a fresh scent for hair face and body. I only use a little and it makes great lather. I will buy American Crew from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Hardcock

customer_reviews.title: Leaked upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, the bottle was leaking when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Thien Hua

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My uncle is old school and loved the Crew gel, after was more difficult for him to find his bryl creme, or whatever he used to use, and he loved it. Hoping I’ll get the same response from him for the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Super shopper

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, not great not very musky smell like the daily shampoo
customer_reviews.author: WRam

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product but the scent is just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shampoo. He is VERY picky too🤫... He says it smells great and leaves his hair feeling clean and soft. Well worth the $10!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Classic smell
customer_reviews.text: So perfect. If you've used any of their other products, you're familiar with their "just shaved" kind of smell. Super fresh, clean, and makes my hair feel good, too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Martin Monnett

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: my boys and I use this. smellls great and does the trick for the $
customer_reviews.author: DOLIMITE

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. After morning use, I smell like a medicine cabinet. Odor lingers in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ross E. Dryer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It does wonders for my hair and my girlfriend loves the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Every guy needs to try this!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Crew for years .. and will use for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: DaveW

customer_reviews.title: My splurge item for personal care
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, probably spending more on this than I have a right to (compared to the stuff you find on the shelf at the local mart). I'll keep buying it, though, 'cuz I like it.
customer_reviews.author: SoulfulSeñor

customer_reviews.title: High quality product at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Works great, 2x more and still cheaper than in the store, smells great, works just as good. Crew is too notch stuff
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Smell good, feel good!
customer_reviews.text: Smell I thought was great, last me like 5 hours till you don't get a strong of smell but works greats
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Soap every where!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think that my package would come looking like it was tosssd around. The cap was broke as seen in the picture. I can only say that the new planner I bought was sealed in its own package. I would like a replacement but am not seeing that option in return!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy showering with this. It is a very good, quality product. Great packaging from this last purchase. Second time buying this and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Husbands favorite
customer_reviews.text: Hubs loved it and it was a great value!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good gel
customer_reviews.text: It's great it doesn't leave white spots in my hair
customer_reviews.author: Gadiel Gordillo

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says doesn’t leave a buildup in my husbands hair and gets him clean and conditioned in one product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lafayette

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only body wash my son uses, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: He says it's a perfect hair product and likes the body wash
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product. He says it's a perfect hair product and likes the body wash. I like the price.
customer_reviews.author: Purchased

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. And it smells good too
customer_reviews.author: Phong Doan

customer_reviews.title: love the smell of this product
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use it all over... and it moisturizes too
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: ... American Crew fragrance for which I have been a great fan. I prefer not to use this everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: The 3-in-1 has the classic American Crew fragrance for which I have been a great fan. I prefer not to use this everyday as a shampoo. Instead I use other daily shampoos and use the 3-in-1 one every week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: Great mans product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband says he loves this! The smell and the feel of it!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising ! No TEA TREE OIL
customer_reviews.text: picture of bottle shows ingredient list containing TEA TREE OIL. i received the product. NO tea tree oil and different ingredients list !! False advertising !!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Love this product !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product , my beard loves it. Also the shipping was fast ,and the product was well packed with bubble wrap. Absolutely no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Peter kruis

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: This all in one wash is perfect for the teenager and sleepy husband in the morning with its peppermint scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaker!
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully it arriving a plastic bag! Cap was loose and product had leaked into the bag! I had to “SHAMPOO” the bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Knock off?
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t smell the same. It smells nice but there is no tea tree scent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this product for years and refuses to use anything else. Now that my son is older and uses it as well, it was getting costly. Amazon’s price was far below anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Del Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a professional shampoo & conditioner and looks it too!
customer_reviews.text: I never buy fancy-dancy hair products, but this one is a must-buy for all the guys out there. Feels like a professional shampoo & conditioner and looks it too! What makes it even better is that it is 2-in-1... no... 3-in-1. I still use shower gel for my body, but anywhere there is hair, I use the American Crew Classic.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley M. Maravalli

customer_reviews.title: One bottle Instead of 3 items in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: Lathers well, works great as body wash & I shampoo. No more messy soap dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R.

customer_reviews.title: Item broken
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was broken in the package and the contents(shampoo) was all inside the box and on my doorstep when I retrieved the box. What a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Earle M.

customer_reviews.title: Cap broke leaked into packaging
customer_reviews.text: They want me to repackage it and send it back, not worth my time, nice mess in the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Lathers well
customer_reviews.text: Product lathers well but much needs to be desired about the scent. Smells fair and does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I've been using the American Crew products ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I've been using the American Crew products for years and just recently added the 3-in-1 to my travel bag. It works very well to replace the shampoo, conditioner and soap in my luggage with just this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heddings

customer_reviews.title: All around great, last forever, cheap
customer_reviews.text: The best shampoo I ever had. Normally two in ones are worse but this is great, and it is so cheap for how much you get. Lather feels great, hair feels good after. Nothing bad I can say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price on this giant bottle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price on this giant bottle. Since having it used on my hair at Super Cuts, it is now my favorite. Combo shampoo, conditioner and body wash. Leaves your hair soft, not dry and your skins smells great. The ladies comment on how nice it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and great product
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and great product. My hair is thin and, where I live is high up in elevation and dry, so this does the job for being a conditioner and shampoo for me. Also helps that this is a body wash as well since then it's a single (big) bottle of soap that I need for the every day. I already bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Delphia

customer_reviews.title: Best value and its always readily available.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I can’t always find this in salons but we know we can always find it here... and the price is great. Best value. It’s all my son will use.
customer_reviews.author: Kanoye Capps

customer_reviews.title: Always the best on the market?
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this stuff, has been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sruby

customer_reviews.title: FAST AND EFFICIENT AND WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a year. 3 in 1,just makes it that much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Blake

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: Best deal out there! My husband loves this 3-in-1, but we can’t find it anywhere without spending a fortune. Smells amazing and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen

product_meta.title: AMERICAN CREW 3-in-1 Shampoo Conditioner and Body Wash, 33.8 Fl Oz
